Suezos Survival Deck (still in the making)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battlecard Episode II Archive (PSOne): Recipes: Suezos Survival Deck (still in the making)
By Suezo183 on Saturday, September 2, 2000 - 11:26 pm:

I just through together some cards that seemed proper for a good defense and it won the rank A I defended against espada =) so I will list all im using but I am still working on it so if you have any comments and/or changes please post what you think!

Monsters being used are:

Monol:
Henger:
Gali:

The main step for this deck is too survive off course I dont know how I did it but it worked for me so far im still playing other comps with it though so far ive beat espada totti Rascal.

Skill Cards:
Monol: 3Tentacles (good if he is stocking guts it takes them all away =), 3Shockbreath, 3Shield, 2Wall cuz I only have 2 if you have 3 go right ahead =),

Henger: 3DodgePrograms (very usefull indeed), 3TrueVision, 3hyperSpeed!

Gali: I only picked gali because he has deflect and tactics which makes for an awsome defense setup. 3Tactics, 3Deflects, 3Laydowns

Any Monster Cards: 3Dodge, 3Grits, 3Retreats, 3BlowAways(thinking about taking them out you decide =)

Breeder Cards: 3Magos, 2Confusions, 3BusyTimes, 1LockTight(I might test taking out the blowaways too put 3 locktights instead)

Hey I think this deck can work out! Give me feedback on this and good luck with it!
